mapper.insert: INSERT INTO folder( folder_name AS folderName, folder_desc AS folderDesc, parent_folder_id AS parentFolderId, content_url AS contentUrl, created_user_id AS createdUserId) VALUES ( #{folderName}, #{folderDesc}, #{parentFolderId}, #{contentUrl}, #{createdUserId});
mapper.select: SELECT folder_id AS folderId, folder_name AS folderName, folder_desc AS folderDesc, parent_folder_id AS parentFolderId, content_url AS contentUrl, created_user_id AS createdUserId, created_user_date AS createdUserDate FROM folder WHERE created_user_id = #{createdUserId} AND parent_folder_id is NULL
